lines.text:
[stops dancing]
I just couldn't permit our talent to be bumped all over the floor.

[gives the hand gesture]
With all my heart, my speech, my thoughts.
That's what Herr Goebbels said about me once. I was deeply flattered.
Officially I think you're crazy. Unofficially I'm off duty.
What is this, the Middle Ages?
No, the Middle East, but it sometimes comes to the same thing.
Don't worry about them; they're running their heads straight into a noose!

[referring to the murder of Chalmers]
Obviously a crime of passion.

[Sarcastically]
With a tinge of politics perhaps.

[to Yvonne]
The Oldest City in the World and here I am right in the middle of it suffering from the oldest emotion!

[to Chakka]
What are you today? An undercover man out in the open?
